#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <cstring>
#include <cmath>
using namespace std;

int main() {
	int m='A'-1;
	int t; cin >> t;
	while(t--){
	    int n; cin >> n;
	    if(n==1){
	        cout << "A\n";
	    }
	    else if(n==2){
	        cout << "AA\n";
	    }
	    else{
	        cout << "AA";
	        long long int a=1;long long int b=1,c;
	        
	        for(int i=0;i<n-2;i++){
	            c=a+b;
	            long long int temp=c;
	            if(temp>26){
	                temp=temp%26;
	            }
	            if(temp==0)temp=26;
	            char ch=m+temp;
	            cout << ch;
	            a=b;
	            b=c;
	        }
	        cout << "\n";
	    }
	}
	return 0;
}
